items.sentence: Tom and Mary moved to Australia three years ago.
There are a lot of things to see and visit here.
I'd rather starve to death than steal something.
This has been happening for several decades now.
I hope that I can manage to make both ends meet.
I hope that you can do something to help me out.
I hope that I can find Tom before the police do.
I hope Tom didn't tell anyone about what we did.
Do you know anyone who can teach my kids French?
I wish that you didn't have to go to work today.
I wish that you could be here with me right now.
I wish that I'd never told Tom that I knew Mary.
I wish that we could go to Boston and visit Tom.
I really hope that this isn't some kind of hoax.
You won't be able to do that with just one hand.
No one believed that Tom would actually do that.
Tom told Mary that everything was taken care of.
Tom didn't ask Mary to go to the dance with him.
You can drink water, but you can also let it be.
That isn't really why you don't like Tom, is it?
You aren't the only one who doesn't believe Tom.
Tom will get himself killed if he isn't careful.
Tom said he isn't sure whether Mary can do that.
Tom knows that he isn't supposed to eat peanuts.
Tom knows he isn't very good at speaking French.
Tom doesn't know he isn't likely to be punished.
Tom isn't alone in his car. Someone is with him.
Don't pretend you don't know what this is about.
I hope everything will turn out well in the end.
I hadn't seen a lion before I was ten years old.
I wonder what it's like to travel through space.
I had to resort to threats to get my money back.
I wore out two pairs of jogging shoes last year.
I saw some of the guests leave the banquet room.
I apologize for the delay in sending the agenda.
I find it hard to get up early on cold mornings.
I was happy to find that they agreed to my plan.
I hope this makes it through baggage inspection.
I got more and more bored as the speech went on.
I passed the city hall on my way to the station.
I received your letter the day before yesterday.
I think this one is inferior to that in quality.
I couldn't see the parade well from where I was.
I left my wallet at home on that particular day.
I was surprised at how expensive the shoes were.
I found it best to say nothing about the matter.
I don't find that idea the least bit comforting.
Tom is planning to write a book about Australia.
I'm going to eat as soon as I finish doing this.
Tom said he'd be going back to Boston on Monday.
